alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 10:40AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Coffee, northwestern Pierce, southeastern Atkinson, northwestern Ware, Bacon, Jeff Davis and Appling Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1040 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Snipesville to 6 miles north of Nicholls to 9 miles west of Dixie Union. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baxley, Hazlehurst, Alma, Graham, Surrency, Plant Hatch, Nicholls, Dixie Union, Denton and New Lacy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce
